quote: The faithless are surprised, that the faithful put no faith in them; the infidels are astounded that the wise do not put trust in them. After all we don't entrust cement to grow abundant foliage.
quote_letters: THE FAITHLESS ARE SURPRISED THAT THE FAITHFUL PUT NO FAITH IN THEM THE INFIDELS ARE ASTOUNDED THAT THE WISE DO NOT PUT TRUST IN THEM AFTER ALL WE DONT ENTRUST CEMENT TO GROW ABUNDANT FOLIAGE
